_meanings:
{@--2@} (As a prefix to nouns
not derived from verbs, and to 
adjectives) It expresses ({%a%}) 
intensity or superiority; {#°DarmaH#} ‘supreme
duty’; {#°tAmra#} ‘very red, {#°nava#} ‘very
new’; ({%b%}) ‘towards,’ ‘in the 
direction of,’ forming <ab>adv.</ab> compounds;
{#°cEdyaM, °muKaM, °dUti#} &c.

{@--3@} (As a
separable adverb) It means 
towards, in the direction or 
vicinity of (<ab>opp.</ab> {#apa#}); in, above, aloft,
on the top, (mostly Ved).

{@--4@} (As a
preposition with <ab>acc.</ab>) ({%a%}) To, 
towards, in the direction of, against;
(with <ab>acc.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab> in this
sense); {#aByAgni#} or {#agnimaBi SalaBAH#}
{#pataMti; vfkzamaBi dyotate vidyut#} <ls>Sk.</ls>;  
<ls>Śi. 9. 56</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">7. 40</ls>; {#aByarkabiMbaM sTitaH#} <ls>Ś. 7. 11.</ls>
({%b%}) Near, before, in front or
presence of; <ls>Śi. 7. 32</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">15. 58.</ls>
({%c%}) On, upon, with regard or 
reference to; {#sAyamaMqanamaBi tvarayaMtyaH#}  
<ls>Ki. 9. 6</ls>; {#sADurdevadatto mAtaramaBi#} <ls>Sk.</ls> ({%d%})
Severally, one after another (in a
distributive sense); {#vfkzaM vfkzamaBi#} 
{#siMcati#} <ls>Sk.</ls>; {#BUtaBUtamaBi praBuH#} <ls>Bop.</ls> By 

<ls>P. I. 4. 91</ls> {#aBi#} has all the senses of
{#anu#} given in <ls n="P.">I. 4. 90</ls> except that of
{#BAga#}; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} ({#lakzaRe#}) {#harimaBi vartate#}; ( 
{#itTaMBUtAKyAne#}) {#Bakto harimaBi#}; ({#vIpsAyAM#}), {#devaM#}
{#devamaBi siMcati#}; but {#yadatra mamABizyAt taddIyatAM#};
{#prAjYo goviMdamaBitizWati#} <ls>Bop.</ls> ({%e%}) In, into,
to; <ls>Śi. 8. 60.</ls> ({%f%}) For, for the sake
of, on account of (<ab>Ved.</ab>). According
to <ls>G. M.</ls> {#aBi#} has these senses:

,
